alert.note: Alert for Barry; McDonald (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 08 at 10:53PM CDT until May 08 at 11:30PM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: The National Weather Service in Springfield has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern McDonald County in southwestern Missouri... Southwestern Barry County in southwestern Missouri... * Until 1130 PM CDT. * At 1053 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Pea Ridge, or 10 miles east of Bella Vista, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Roaring River State Park, Cassville, Seligman and Washburn. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
